definition[0]: to smile or speak in a very unkind way that shows you have no respect for someone or something
example[0]: ‘Is that your best outfit?’ he sneered.
example[1]: She sneered at Tom’s musical tastes.
definition[1]: an unkind smile or remark that shows you have no respect for something or someone
example[2]: ‘You probably wouldn’t understand, ’ he said with a sneer.
